plot: A termite named Roberto pursues his dream of becoming an architect and travels to the big city where he hopes to find success.
title: Roberto the Insect Architect
plot_es: A termite named Roberto pursues his dream of becoming an architect and travels to the big city where he hopes to find success.
plot_en: A termite named Roberto pursues his dream of becoming an architect and travels to the big city where he hopes to find success.
